title: The Jewel of Istanbul
description: Serkan Bolat is the cold and manipulative CEO of Turkey's largest jewelery empire and he has it all: wealth, good looks, and an endless array of hot women eager to satisfy his every desire... after his death. Eda Yildiz is stunningly beautiful, talented and owed a lot. What happens when her hateful boss, Serkan Bolat, makes an unexpected offer that could save her life and ruin it forever?URL: my.w.tt/DpKCgxzrzbb
author: Tsarina
